DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of Next Generation Ophthalmic Irrigating Solution (NGOIS) compared to BSS Plus for use during cataract extraction and intra-ocular lens (IOL) implantation.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Next Generation Ophthalmic Irrigating Solution Compared to BSS Plus
DOC.criteria: Patients any race or sex 18 or older and undergoing cataract extraction with planned implantation of a posterior chamber intraocular lens. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under 18 Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
